options.description: Feeling pressured to give unnecessary/inappropriate tests and/or treatments
Having to continue aggressive treatment not in the patient's best interest
Causing unnecessary suffering or do not relieve pain/symptoms
Ignoring situations of inadequate informed consent
Witnessing providers giving "false hope" to patients/families
Having to follow MD/family's request to not discuss prognosis
Seeing unclear/inconsistent treatment plans or goals of care
Witnessing lack of provider continuity
Fearing retribution if I speak up
Witnessing other team members not competent in providing quality care
Fearing litigation
Feeling pressured to ignore medical error(s)
Feeling not supported enough to report a violation of procedure/ethics
Working with teams who don't treat patients with dignity/respect
Feeling unsafe/bullied amongst own colleagues
Working within power structures that compromise patient care
Witnessing poor team communication
Witnessing inconsistent messages to patient/family
Caring for patients not qualified to care for
Caring for more patients than is safe
Experiencing lack of administrative/managerial support
Feeling required to work with abusive patients/family members
Feeling pressured from admin/insurers to reduce costs over patient care
Experiencing lack of resources/beds/equipment
Experiencing excessive documentation requirements
Feeling pressured to emphasize productivity/quality measures over patients
